tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RecyclingMonitoring (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  recycling_type VARCHAR(50),
  weight DECIMAL,
  collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  reading DECIMAL(10,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_strategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(100),
  materials_accepted TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE circular_economy (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  recycled_materials TEXT,
  production_site VARCHAR(255),
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingCenter (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE RecyclingMaterial (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(255),
    recycling_fee DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE RecyclingTransaction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    center_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE RecyclingStatistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    total_recycled_quantity INT,
    total_amount_earned DECIMAL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)
